meya gowinta karana lada asadharana kriyawak.ahalepola welyaya aaraksha kara ganima sandaha idiriyata anawasara idikirim idi nowimatath danata anawasara idikirim kara athi ayata wiruddhawa nithimaya piyawara ganna lesa adala wagakiwayuthu anshawalata upades dunneya.balangoda kalthota saha pothupitiya pradeshawalata pohora niyamitha dinata nolabima sambandhawa helidaraw wu karunu sambandhawa adahas chakwu disthrik lekam sunil kannangara mahatha mese kiya.aayathana dekakin pohora beda harima meyata hethuwa yayi da nisi paridi rathnapura disthrikkaya thula beda harime hakiyawak athi lak pohora samagamata ho komashal aayathanaya yana aayathana deken ekakata pawarimata piyawara ganna lesa pohora lekam karyalayata danum dena lesa da upades dunneya.gowinta awashya pohora kalata welawata nolabenawa nam ewani aayathanawalin wadak nathayi pawasu disthrik lekamwaraya ilakkagatha sanwardhanaya kara yamata nam gowiyata awashya pohora ha anekuth pahasukam labadima ape yuthukama yayi pawasiya.rathnapura disthrikkaye siyaluma pradeshiya lekamwarun, krushikarma departhamenthuwa, gowijana sewa departhamenthuwa athulu rajya aayathana pradhanihu mema sakachchawata sahabhagi wuha..

palath sabha mathiwarana pawathwimata niyamitha nangenahira, sabaragamuwa saha uthurumada palathwala wishesha aarakshaka wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka kirimata polis departhamenthuwa piyawara gena thibe.ema palathwala sama disthrik lekam karyalayak asalama mathiwarana polis murapolak pihituwima me wanawita aarambha kara athayi polis prakashaka polis adhikari ajith rohana mahatha ‘dinaminata’ eeye (13) pawasiya.me masa 19 wanada nama yojana bhara dima awasan wimen pasu chandaya pawathwena pradeshawala aarakshawa sandaha wenama polis eekakayan yedawimata polis departhamenthuwa salasum kara thibe..
supurudu paridi yojanawa yomu wela thibune ape thaththata.
engalanthaye di parikshanayata bhajana wu pashanayath lankawe di parikshanayata bhajana wu pashanayath dekak wiya haki bawata mahacharya huwar dakwana adahasa sambandha obe adahasa kumak da?

kohomada danagaththe mama innawa kiyala?

elle kridawa thawa thawath idiriyata rageka yama sadaha ma ganna ek uthsahayak pamani..........
sarala kathawak wana meya yowun nawa katha ganayata ayathwana kruthiyaki.
ee wage samaja aarakshana ka්ramawedayak nathi wunama, wayasata giya stha්rinta saha purusha deparshawayata lamayi matha ho wenath parshawayan matha yapenna siddha wenawa.

me athara ramasan uthsawaya wenuwen janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha subha pathum paniwudayak nikuth karamin kiya sitiye parithyagaya, samaya ha gaurawaya mul karagath mema uthsawaya mulu mahath lokayata uthum paniwudayak ek karana bawayi.
mita balapa thakshanika menma deshapalana hethu athi bawayi mage hangima.
ee widiyata wenna oona kiyala hithana sanwardhana kriyawaliyak nisa siduwena winashayak thamayi mama ara kiwwe....
aththatama ayiye eeka kiwwe naththe gota aawama ee kattiyath ekka witharak eya dil ekak daganna nisa.
